entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 14.
entry.summary: Showers with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 early this afternoon. High 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
